name: Reskimo
description:
Shift - Switches Character

R - Resets the Level

When red:

-> A - Left

-> D - Right

When green:

-> W - Jump

-> S - Crouch

-> Left-Click - Shoot

There are two levels. The run ends after finishing Level 2 - Post your time in the comments below! ( Dev Time is the best time we achieved, have fun beating it! :)
